message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take a small slice of the pie, and we can get this over with quickly.
I'm not feeling quite as generous as you, Alice. I think a 90/10 split is fair, considering the shrinking value of our money.
Okay, Bob. Let's try a 90/10 split, but in my favor this time. I'm willing to compromise, but we need to move quickly before the money loses even more value.
